Html:
hi!

first of all: this control is a real great job! congratulations :-)

i tried to add routes to the control which works well.

is it possible to add VIA points to a route? say.. i have a route from A to B. there are several possibilities for the route between A and B. Is it possible to give a third point C which the route has to pass? I allready thought of adding a third marker and then use the middle marker for the end point of the first and start point of the secound route. Google has now a feature where one can pick a point of the route and drag it onto a road which results in a route recalculation.

is this possible?

 

thank you and best regards, florian

hey! ;}

yes, but it's not included in current code

is it included in the svn version?

thank you!

ETA - Estimated time of arrival :-)

do you have an idea when the version with the via-points will be available?

thank you!
you can easily add that function by your self, it's just third keyword in url. I'll check this some day... eta = unknow ;}

if somebody else needs the feature:

the google maps parameter is called via:

via= “via” gives a comma separated list of intermediate addresses for directions, that should be ‘via points’.

(from http://www.querystring.org/google-maps/google-maps-query-string-parameters)

best regards, florian

overfloouuu,

Can you post the code you used to get it to work?

Thanks.
